name: Chocolate BonBon
description: Using the traditional way to hand temper chocolate to perfection, result in a luxurious & smooth chocolate shell with a variety of melt-in-your-mouth fillings. Made to order.
ingredients: Hand-tempered Chocolate shell with assorted ganache. An example of our flavours are : Bailey and Milk Chocolate Ganache / Salted Caramel / lime / honey and praline / Dark Chocolate Caramel / Raspberry and Vanilla
storageInstruction: Avoid direct sunlight, high temperature and humidity. Store in a cool place (15°C to 18°C is the optimal temperature).
allergen: Contains Dairy and Wheat. May contain traces of nuts.

name: Almond Cluster
description: Milk Chocolate with twice oven baked almond. Full of crunchy, nutty texture of almonds contrasts beautifully with the rich, velvety chocolate coating. Option for plant-based Chocolate, please let us know when placing order.
storageInstruction: Avoid direct sunlight, high temperature and humidity. Store in a cool place (15°C to 18°C is the optimal temperature).
allergen: Contains Dairy and Wheat. May contain traces of nuts.

name: Chocolate bar
description: Our confections are carefully crafted by hand using fresh ingredients. Our best seller - Belgian Chocolate 54% or plant-based Chocolate, with or without mixed nuts. Let us know when placing order.
ingredients: Flavours : Single origin 70% Dark Chocolate / Creamy Milk Chocolate with mixed nuts / 54% Belgian Dark Chocolate with rose petal & freeze-dried strawberry powder.
storageInstruction: Avoid direct sunlight, high temperature and humidity. Store in a cool place (15°C to 18°C is the optimal temperature).
allergen: Contains Dairy and Wheat. May contain traces of nuts.

name: Chocolate Mendiant Series
description: Chocolate Mendiant is a traditional French confection. We beautifully arranged it with dried fruits and nut on top of our high quality hand-tempered chocolate.
ingredients: 54% Belgian Dark Chocolate with dried apricot, dried cranberries, roasted Australian almond and nuts.
storageInstruction: Avoid direct sunlight, high temperature and humidity. Store in a cool place (15°C to 18°C is the optimal temperature).
allergen: Contains Dairy and Wheat. May contain traces of nuts.

name: Chocolate Animals
description: Our cutest Chocolate animals are playful and delighted confections made from rich, smooth hand-tempered chocolate and shape it in various   animals such as lions, bunnies, elephants, pig, cows. It is perfect for children's parties, festive occasions or personalized gifts.
storageInstruction: Avoid direct sunlight, high temperature and humidity. Store in a cool place (15°C to 18°C is the optimal temperature).
allergen: Contains Dairy and Wheat. May contain traces of nuts.

name: Signature Flourless Chocolate Cake
description: An indulgent and three-layered chocolate goodness, with a chocolaty and smooth ganache to enhance luxurious feel. It's a decadent  treat for chocoalte lovers and for any occasion.
ingredients: Chocolate(52%)(Sugar, Cocoa Butter, Milk Solids, Soya Lecithin, Vanilla), Sugar, Egg, Butter(Milk), Milk, Vanilla
allergen: Contains Dairy and Wheat. May contain traces of nuts.

name: Macaron XL
description: Signature flavour - Smooth and silky lemon buttercream, tangy Lemon curd, fresh berries & Chocolate garnish on top.
ingredients: Almond flour, sugar, egg, lemon, butter, chocolate & food colouring.
allergen: Contains Dairy and Wheat. May contain traces of nuts.

name: Macaron XL
description: Signature flavour - Praline, Praline buttercream, roasted Almond & Chocolate ganrish on top.
ingredients: Almond flour, sugar, egg, nuts, butter, chocolate & food colouring.
allergen: Contains Dairy and Wheat. May contain traces of nuts.

name: Nuttie Florentine
description: A delicate, crispy and caramelized biscuit combined with thinly sliced nuts. It is crunchy and slightly chewy.
allergen: Contains Dairy and Wheat. May contain traces of nuts.

name: Basque Cheese Cake
description: Deep caramelized notes from the burnt top and a velvety, melt-in-your-mouth interior with a subtle tang from the cream cheese. It is simple yet indulgent dessert to share.
ingredients: Cream cheese, cream, sugar, egg, & vanilla.
allergen: Contains Dairy and Wheat. May contain traces of nuts.
